name: Sunset (itch) (queraxe)
description:
This is a funny little game :)

Solo mode:
You can move the circle with the arrow keys and you have to go over the 'black loch' to score. You have 60 seconds to beat your highscore ;)

Duo mode:
Player one can move with w a s d and player two with the arrow keys. The first one who reaches a score of 20 wins!

When you reach level 5 you can go out of the screen and you come out on the other side of the screen.
